about_the_game:
The VIP Shuttle Experience is a free virtual reality experience in a futuristic, urban environment. Complete your mission to get to your important meeting on time by reaching the VIP Shuttle. But be careful, before you have to pass the security-check, meet drones, and after a breath-taking elevator ride you have to prove how courageous you really are ...
Features
• Breath-taking, futuristic atmosphere
• Sophisticated, highly-detailed 3D views
• Storyline with increasing degree of challenges
• Pure fun
detailed_description:
The VIP Shuttle Experience is a free virtual reality experience in a futuristic, urban environment. Complete your mission to get to your important meeting on time by reaching the VIP Shuttle. But be careful, before you have to pass the security-check, meet drones, and after a breath-taking elevator ride you have to prove how courageous you really are ...
Features
• Breath-taking, futuristic atmosphere
• Sophisticated, highly-detailed 3D views
• Storyline with increasing degree of challenges
• Pure fun
legal_notice: Please note that this app and included VR experiences are intended for private and non-public use only. Please contact us for more information on our corporate licences and customisation options.
name: VIP Shuttle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 3.8m by 3.2m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: The VIP Shuttle Experience is a free virtual reality experience in a futuristic environment. Complete your mission to get to your meeting on time by reaching the VIP Shuttle. You face numerous challenges and in the end you have to prove how courageous you really are ...
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
